title: "Leningrad" Inkstand
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Inkstand in the form of two books lying stacked on their sides; two scrolls of paper rising from top surface; a domed cover for inkwell and a pen lying on paper; red enamel and gilded decoration
name: inkwell
